text: Cactus Flower is a 1969 American comedy movie. Ingrid Bergman plays Stephanie Dickinson. Goldie Hawn plays Toni Simmons. Walter Matthau plays Julian Winston. The movie received an Oscar for Goldie Hawn for her performance. It also won a Golden Globe Award for Best Supporting Actress. It was liked both by the general public and critics. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1969 comedy movies Category:1969 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Cactus Flower
